snippet.title: The Daedalus Encounter - Live! 3DO Magazine Trailer
snippet.description:
As seen on the fifth issue of Live! 3DO Magazine from Japan, this is a preview of the 3DO port of The Daedalus Encounter. Perhaps the most interesting thing about this game is that the original developer, Mechadeus, eventually rebranded as Mondo Media to focus on animated internet cartoons, including their most famous shows: Happy Tree Friends and Dick Figures.

Ported to 3DO by Lifelike Productions
Published in Japan by HotNet and PalmSoft
The Daedalus Encounter (C) Mondo Media (formely known as Mechadeus)
Also released on PC

#3do #live3do #live3domagazine #3dogames #3dointeractivemultiplayer #retrogaming #retrogames #thedaedalusencounter #mechadeus #mondomedia
